to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: ot: current weather conditions
body:
>must have the lynx browser installed in order to use this.

Or if elinks is your browser of choice just replace lynx with elinks and
you're fine. So to be mmore accurate you require some text browser. I
tthink links supports dump as well.
